programme.title: Daas Dev
programme.desc: Dev, a political heir to the throne, finds himself in a dilemma when his lover Paro challenges him on the grounds of politics.

programme.title: The Shaukeens
programme.desc: Bored of their mundane lifestyles, three sexagenarian friends, Laali, Pinky and KD, go on a vacation to Mauritius. There, they meet Ahana and each of them try to woo her in their own style.

programme.title: Turtle
programme.desc: While Ramkaran is forced to churn water from the earth in a drought-struck village, the plight of villagers intensifies as they seek different means to quench their thirst.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
programme.desc: Sonny and Sam find an ancient manuscript in an abandoned house while cleaning it. However, things escalate when the text brings a ventriloquist dummy named Slappy to life.

programme.title: Haseena Maan Jaayegi
programme.desc: When Sonu and Monu, two mischievous brothers, play a prank on their father, he sends them for work to Goa. They end up falling in love and go to great lengths to impress the girls' father.
When mobiles start flying from people's hands, Dr Vaseegaran and his robot Nila are asked to help. However, due to Pakshi Rajan having a hand in this, the two have to reinstate Chitti to defeat him.

programme.title: Himmatwar
programme.desc: Vasu makes a bitter enemy in gangster Anna after he saves a senior officer from his henchmen. The rivalry extends further when Anna's wife kills Vasu's mother in a bid to usurp a huge piece of land.

programme.title: Ooru Peru Bhairavakona
programme.desc: After committing a robbery, Basava and his companion, John, run into Agraharam Geetha, a stranger, and the trio end up in Bhairavakona, a village shrouded in mystery.

programme.title: Tumbbad
programme.desc: When a family builds a shrine for Hastar, a monster who is never to be worshipped, and attempts to get their hands on his cursed wealth, they face catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: Seetimaarr
programme.desc: An assistant bank manager tries to fulfil his father's dream of opening a sports academy by training a women's kabaddi team for a state-level championship.

programme.title: Khaali Peeli
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts Pooja and Blackie get separated due to circumstances. Years later, when Pooja escapes from the brothel where she is forced to work, she bumps into Blackie, now a taxi driver.

programme.title: Kaun Kitney Paani Mein
programme.desc: The residents of two villages, Upri and Bairi, have opposed each other for many years. They try to reconcile with each other after a severe water shortage hits one of the villages.

programme.title: Fitoor
programme.desc: Noor, a Kashmiri boy from a poor family, is hired as a stable keeper by a begum. When he begins to fall in love with Firdaus, the begum's daughter, she separates them by sending her away.

programme.title: No 1 Businessman
programme.desc: Surya, a young man, moves to Mumbai to join the mafia and he forms his own gang by recruiting criminals. However, things take a turn when he falls for a police officer's daughter.

programme.title: Khiladi 786
programme.desc: Mansukh's father runs a marriage bureau and believes that his son is a failure in life. In order to prove him wrong, Mansukh takes on the task of finding a match for a gangster's sister.

programme.title: Shoorveer
programme.desc: Siddharth is separated from his family as a child and he grows up hating his father. While his father tries to locate him, he ends up falling in love with Sitara and tries to win her heart.

programme.title: Bulandi
programme.desc: Dharamraj Thakur, the head of a village, is highly respected by the villagers but his dignity is at stake when his younger brother, Arjun, is falsely accused of raping a schoolteacher.

programme.title: Krrish 3
programme.desc: Krrish and his father must defeat human-animal mutants created by an evil genius, Kaal, who is hell-bent on destroying the world. His vile army is led by a chameleon mutant, Kaya.

programme.title: Batti Gul Meter Chalu
programme.desc: The lives of three childhood friends, SK, Lalita and Sundar, take a shocking turn after Sundar's printing press receives an extremely inflated electricity bill.

programme.title: Daas Dev
programme.desc: Dev, a political heir to the throne, finds himself in a dilemma when his lover Paro challenges him on the grounds of politics.

programme.title: Mere Pyare Prime Minister
programme.desc: After his mother is raped one night, Kannu, an eight-year-old boy, writes a letter to the prime minister of India and embarks on a journey from Mumbai to Delhi with his two friends.

programme.title: Badlapur - Don't Miss The Beginning
programme.desc: Raghu loses his wife and son when two bank robbers steal their car in a bid to run. Devastated by the incident, Raghu decides to take revenge on the culprits, Liak and Harman, for killing his family.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
programme.desc: Sonny and Sam find an ancient manuscript in an abandoned house while cleaning it. However, things escalate when the text brings a ventriloquist dummy named Slappy to life.

programme.title: Manikarnika: The Queen of Jhansi
programme.desc: Manikarnika, the wife of the king of Jhansi, refuses to bow down when the East India Company tries to annex the kingdom. Her rebellion soon turns into a fiery revolution against the British Raj.

programme.title: Kaun Kitney Paani Mein
programme.desc: The residents of two villages, Upri and Bairi, have opposed each other for many years. They try to reconcile with each other after a severe water shortage hits one of the villages.

programme.title: Fitoor
programme.desc: Noor, a Kashmiri boy from a poor family, is hired as a stable keeper by a begum. When he begins to fall in love with Firdaus, the begum's daughter, she separates them by sending her away.

programme.title: Bawaal
programme.desc: With his profession and reputation on the line, a history professor goes on a tour of Europe with his wife, who has epilepsy, under the guise of fixing their relationship.

programme.title: Khiladi 786
programme.desc: Mansukh's father runs a marriage bureau and believes that his son is a failure in life. In order to prove him wrong, Mansukh takes on the task of finding a match for a gangster's sister.

programme.title: Happy New Year
programme.desc: In a quest to pull off a heist at a hotel in Dubai, Charlie assembles a team of non-dancers to take part in a dance competition at the hotel. They enlist the help of a bar dancer.

programme.title: Janhit Mein Jaari
programme.desc: With the will to break taboo as her armour of choice, Mannu embarks to work as a condom salesperson, despite the reservations of her family and society.

programme.title: Krrish 3
programme.desc: Krrish and his father must defeat human-animal mutants created by an evil genius, Kaal, who is hell-bent on destroying the world. His vile army is led by a chameleon mutant, Kaya.

programme.title: Batti Gul Meter Chalu
programme.desc: The lives of three childhood friends, SK, Lalita and Sundar, take a shocking turn after Sundar's printing press receives an extremely inflated electricity bill.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Happu Singh, Gulfam Kali and Saxena agree to go to Nainital. Later, Vibhuti and Manmohan mix 'jamaalgotaa' in each other's tea cups at the stall, thinking that the health of the other will get spoilt.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: As everyone is ready to leave for Nainital, Vibhuti and Manmohan suffer from loose motions. As they are in the washroom at the railway station when the train arrives, they miss it.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: When Vibhuti and Manmohan board the train at the next railway station, their wives scold them. Later, the seating arrangement irks Anita. A newly married couple plans to rob their fellow passengers.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan brags in front of a shivering Vibhuti that he is not affected by the cold weather in Kanpur. Later, the police commissioner of the city requests Anita to inform him about criminal activities.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: A saint gives Manmohan a tablet which protects him from Kanpur's cold weather. Anita decides to use Manmohan to help her inform the police commissioner about criminal activities in Kanpur.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan is excited to help Anita. However, when he visits the saint to procure a tablet, the saint gives him the wrong tablet, which makes Manmohan ill.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti requests Angoori to give ice cream to a shivering Manmohan. Later, Vibhuti visits the same saint to get a tablet to shield him from the cold weather. But the saint gives him the wrong pill.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: The saint gives Vibhuti the wrong tablet, which makes Vibhuti sick. Manmohan and Vibhuti end up getting admitted to the same hospital for treatment.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: As Gulfam Kali is unwell, she is not able to perform as a courtesan. Hence, she is unhappy. Meanwhile, Anita and Vibhuti quarrel over the joblessness of the latter.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Anita is startled when Vibhuti comes home with a pile of cash; when she asks him from where did he earned the money, he does not give a straight answer.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: A worried Anita tells her friend that Vibhuti has been giving her 10,000 rupees every day without telling her the source of his income; when she confronts him, he starts giving excuses.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan asks Anita to meet him at a particular place and claims that he will solve Vibhuti's mystery; Gulfam Kali tells Vibhuti to dance at Manmohan's house.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti's uncle arrives and tells him everything that he has heard about his dance; later, Angoori scolds Vibhuti for not doing the dance steps correctly that she had taught him.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibuti and Manmohan begin to fight and both Anita and Angoori have a tough time stopping them; tired of the behaviour of these men, Anita and Angoori ask the commissioner for a solution.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti and Manmohan compete with each other by displaying better etiquettes; meanwhile, Malkhan and Tika try to find out the real meaning of etiquettes.

programme.title: Bheema - Andhkaar Se Adhikaar Tak
programme.desc: Bheema is instructed to wait for the answer sheet during an exam. When she asks questions, she is told to either let others take their exam undisturbed or leave the premises.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Happu agrees to teach gambling to a complainant's husband. Later, desperate to meet his family's demands, Happu gambles with Beni and tries his own luck after Beni loses.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti buys Tiwari's land using Anita's money and sends Prem to reclaim it from Chichu. However, Chichu has him beaten, thwarting Vibhuti's plan.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti and Tiwari ask the bee to forgive them, and it agrees on one condition. One of the two men will have to step outside without any clothes on.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti comes up with an idea to avoid doing household chores; Happu Singh and Tiwari annoy Anita by asking Vibhuti to do their housework.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan, Saxena and Angoori reveal the truth to Anita about Vibhuti, which surprises her; Vibhuti attempts to learn hypnotism.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: When Vibhuti arrives with a bouquet, Manmohan tells him that he will give it to Anita on his behalf. He also offers to give Vibhuti's love card to Anita.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan buys a new car and is excited to drive Anita to her classes; Vibhuti promises to teach Angoori how to drive after Manmohan refuses to give her lessons.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Anita expresses her disappointment in Vibhuti; Manmohan witnesses Anita entering a stranger's car while she is dressed in a scandalous outfit.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Happu faces Rajesh's wrath for making Senti cry. Later, he suggests marrying Senti off to Gulbiya, which unexpectedly sparks Senti's interest in Gulbiya.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Amma deceives Rajesh by falsely claiming that Happu is a skilled flute player. As a result, Happu confidently dismisses Bansidhar, a professional flautist who arrives at the police station.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Happu's flute lessons with Beni descend into a heated argument, ending in discord. Meanwhile, Ranbir and Chamchi devise a cunning plan to secure roles in the upcoming play.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: In a desperate attempt to avoid playing the flute, Happu pretends to be injured. Later, Amma threatens to make him play the flute.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Chamchi and Ranbir's efforts to join the Janmashtami play are unsuccessful. Meanwhile, Happu recruits Bansidhar to play the flute at the event and deceives Rajesh with false information.

programme.title: Laal Ishq
programme.desc: Daksh wakes up one morning and to his horror, finds his dead mother making his breakfast and knitting a sweater for him. He runs for his life after she kills his maid and turns her attention to him.

programme.title: Paramavatar Shri Krishna
programme.desc: Indra Dev is angry because the villagers of Gokul have not worshipped him. His mother tells him that he might get punished by Tridev for his ego.

programme.title: Happy Hours
programme.desc: Skilled stand-up comedians present hilarious acts and entertain the viewers with their rib-tickling performances and skits.

programme.title: Atal
programme.desc: Edified by his mother, Atal aspires to establish a unified India. His endeavours establish a profound connection with both allies and adversaries.

programme.title: Bheema - Andhkaar Se Adhikaar Tak
programme.desc: A brave young girl from the marginalised community, fights for equal rights, by using her voice against injustice and discrimination prevalent in the society.

programme.title: Baal Shiv
programme.desc: Lord Shiva in his younger avatar, faces several challenges as he strives to uphold justice in his realm and facilitates the destruction of evil forces.

programme.title: Ssshhhh Phir Koi Hai
programme.desc: Ghostbusters travel through time to unearth appalling tales of paranormal incidents experienced by different people and cast away all evil.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Happu lives happily with his family and works day and night as a policeman. However, his life is filled with humorous events and misadventures at home and at work.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti Narayan Mishra and Manmohan Tiwari live in the same neighbourhood in Kanpur. They both try to impress each other's wives but end up landing in peculiar situations.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Angoori discovers that their new servant is Manmohan in disguise as Deepu ran away; Anita is upset about a patch ruining her favourite saree and Manmohan promises to clean it up.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti and Anita arrive at Manmohan's house for dinner, but Vibhuti and Manmohan are adamant on sticking to their etiquettes and give each other respect.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan refuses to entertain Angoori until she threatens to speak to his mother about it; later, Vibhuti humbly invites Angoori and Manmohan for a meal to his house.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti's friend Prem tells him that he wants to commit suicide, as he was beaten up by his wife; although Vibhuti is pleased, he pretends to sympathize with him.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan visits Anita's house and offers a job to Vibhuti in Meerut. Anita is delighted as she feels that Vibhuti's joblessness will now end.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti refuses to relocate to Meerut to work there as he does not want to be away from Angoori. He then realises that Angoori respects farmers. So, he decides to become a farmer.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: The hard work of Vibhuti as a farmer is appreciated by Anita. It is telecast on local news channels. Anita apologises to Vibhuti over her earlier rudeness. A Chinese gang then plans to abduct Vibhuti.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Saxena rescues Vibhuti from the clutches of the Chinese gang. The real truth behind the tomatoes grown by Vibhuti is revealed. Anita scolds Vibhuti.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Anita and Vibhuti as well as the people of the mohalla salute the farmers of the nation for their hard work and toil, which benefits the nation.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: As Anita eats 'poha' for breakfast, Manmohan informs her that he ate a yellowy 'besan kadhi' the day before. Anita praises him, saying that he is eating healthy foodstuff.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan tells Anita that he expected to excrete yellowy stuff after having an enormous amount of 'besan kadhi'. Anita is appalled on hearing him say this.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: When Tika keeps teasing Manmohan regarding his constipation, he hits him on the head; later, a furious Tika files an FIR with inspector Happu, against Manmohan, after Vibhuti insists.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan blocks the pipeline that sends water to the town and refuses to let the water flow as a sign of punishment to those, who have been mocking his situation of constipation.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Angoori tells Anita that she is saddened by the fact that Manmohan is suffering from constipation. She tells Anita that Manmohan howls in pain due to it.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan, Vibhuti and Prem Chaudhary watch a movie, 'Chulbuli'. They praise its heroine in front of their wives. Anita and Angoori then decide to prank their husbands.

programme.title: Bheema - Andhkaar Se Adhikaar Tak
programme.desc: A brave young girl from the marginalised community, fights for equal rights, by using her voice against injustice and discrimination prevalent in the society.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti speaks to Anita about earning enough money to afford a maid; Anita and Angoori begin their selection process for a new maid.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Angoori asks Tiwari to annoy Basanti, who is actually Vibhuti in disguise; while disguised as the maid, Vibhuti hears that Anita is getting bored with him.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti tries to intervene when Inspector Happu is arresting Angoori for murder. Happu shoots him and walks out with Angoori.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Seeing Angoori and Manmohan sharing a romantic moment, Vibhuti heads home and upsets Anita; Vibhuti meets Angoori's father and is delighted to learn that he hates Manmohan.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: When Angoori sees Manmohan leaving the colony with Angelina, she misunderstands the situation. An angry and hurt Angoori threatens to drink poison in front of the entire colony.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti and Manmohan argue over bhindi and Vibhuti grabs the bag and runs; Vibhuti goes to Angoori's house to warn her of the kidnappers roaming around the area.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Bansidhar declines to perform at Happu's event, leading Happu to pretend to play the flute during the Janmashtami celebration. However, his fake playing is eventually uncovered.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Happu devises a scheme to retrieve his stolen coin and extorts money from Reshampal. Meanwhile, Rajesh cleverly manipulates Amma into handing over cash to him.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Reshampal pledges his support to Darling, who then returns the coin to Happu. Meanwhile, Malaika offers Masterji a solution to his predicament.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Rajesh is in a state of disarray, having misplaced Happu's important file and Malaika's belongings. Meanwhile, Doctor KB takes it upon himself to treat Reshampal's ailments at the station.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Rajesh uses the memory-enhancing powder provided by Happu and, after recalling a past event, demands that Happu make amends with Gabbar.

programme.title: Bheema - Andhkaar Se Adhikaar Tak
programme.desc: Bheema is instructed to wait for the answer sheet during an exam. When she asks questions, she is told to either let others take their exam undisturbed or leave the premises.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Happu agrees to teach gambling to a complainant's husband. Later, desperate to meet his family's demands, Happu gambles with Beni and tries his own luck after Beni loses.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti buys Tiwari's land using Anita's money and sends Prem to reclaim it from Chichu. However, Chichu has him beaten, thwarting Vibhuti's plan.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti and Tiwari ask the bee to forgive them, and it agrees on one condition. One of the two men will have to step outside without any clothes on.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti comes up with an idea to avoid doing household chores; Happu Singh and Tiwari annoy Anita by asking Vibhuti to do their housework.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan, Saxena and Angoori reveal the truth to Anita about Vibhuti, which surprises her; Vibhuti attempts to learn hypnotism.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: When Vibhuti arrives with a bouquet, Manmohan tells him that he will give it to Anita on his behalf. He also offers to give Vibhuti's love card to Anita.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan buys a new car and is excited to drive Anita to her classes; Vibhuti promises to teach Angoori how to drive after Manmohan refuses to give her lessons.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Anita expresses her disappointment in Vibhuti; Manmohan witnesses Anita entering a stranger's car while she is dressed in a scandalous outfit.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Happu faces Rajesh's wrath for making Senti cry. Later, he suggests marrying Senti off to Gulbiya, which unexpectedly sparks Senti's interest in Gulbiya.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Amma deceives Rajesh by falsely claiming that Happu is a skilled flute player. As a result, Happu confidently dismisses Bansidhar, a professional flautist who arrives at the police station.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Happu's flute lessons with Beni descend into a heated argument, ending in discord. Meanwhile, Ranbir and Chamchi devise a cunning plan to secure roles in the upcoming play.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: In a desperate attempt to avoid playing the flute, Happu pretends to be injured. Later, Amma threatens to make him play the flute.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Chamchi and Ranbir's efforts to join the Janmashtami play are unsuccessful. Meanwhile, Happu recruits Bansidhar to play the flute at the event and deceives Rajesh with false information.

programme.title: Happy Hours
programme.desc: Audience members reveal personal makeup stories. Suddenly, a makeup artist faces a shocking accusation of causing someone's divorce.

programme.title: Laal Ishq
programme.desc: Daksh wakes up one morning and to his horror, finds his dead mother making his breakfast and knitting a sweater for him. He runs for his life after she kills his maid and turns her attention to him.

programme.title: Paramavatar Shri Krishna
programme.desc: Indra Dev is angry because the villagers of Gokul have not worshipped him. His mother tells him that he might get punished by Tridev for his ego.

programme.title: Happy Hours
programme.desc: Skilled stand-up comedians present hilarious acts and entertain the viewers with their rib-tickling performances and skits.

programme.title: Atal
programme.desc: Edified by his mother, Atal aspires to establish a unified India. His endeavours establish a profound connection with both allies and adversaries.

programme.title: Bheema - Andhkaar Se Adhikaar Tak
programme.desc: A brave young girl from the marginalised community, fights for equal rights, by using her voice against injustice and discrimination prevalent in the society.

programme.title: Baal Shiv
programme.desc: Lord Shiva in his younger avatar, faces several challenges as he strives to uphold justice in his realm and facilitates the destruction of evil forces.

programme.title: Ssshhhh Phir Koi Hai
programme.desc: Ghostbusters travel through time to unearth appalling tales of paranormal incidents experienced by different people and cast away all evil.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Happu lives happily with his family and works day and night as a policeman. However, his life is filled with humorous events and misadventures at home and at work.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti Narayan Mishra and Manmohan Tiwari live in the same neighbourhood in Kanpur. They both try to impress each other's wives but end up landing in peculiar situations.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Angoori discovers that their new servant is Manmohan in disguise as Deepu ran away; Anita is upset about a patch ruining her favourite saree and Manmohan promises to clean it up.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti and Anita arrive at Manmohan's house for dinner, but Vibhuti and Manmohan are adamant on sticking to their etiquettes and give each other respect.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan refuses to entertain Angoori until she threatens to speak to his mother about it; later, Vibhuti humbly invites Angoori and Manmohan for a meal to his house.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti's friend Prem tells him that he wants to commit suicide, as he was beaten up by his wife; although Vibhuti is pleased, he pretends to sympathize with him.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan visits Anita's house and offers a job to Vibhuti in Meerut. Anita is delighted as she feels that Vibhuti's joblessness will now end.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti refuses to relocate to Meerut to work there as he does not want to be away from Angoori. He then realises that Angoori respects farmers. So, he decides to become a farmer.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: The hard work of Vibhuti as a farmer is appreciated by Anita. It is telecast on local news channels. Anita apologises to Vibhuti over her earlier rudeness. A Chinese gang then plans to abduct Vibhuti.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Saxena rescues Vibhuti from the clutches of the Chinese gang. The real truth behind the tomatoes grown by Vibhuti is revealed. Anita scolds Vibhuti.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Anita and Vibhuti as well as the people of the mohalla salute the farmers of the nation for their hard work and toil, which benefits the nation.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: As Anita eats 'poha' for breakfast, Manmohan informs her that he ate a yellowy 'besan kadhi' the day before. Anita praises him, saying that he is eating healthy foodstuff.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan tells Anita that he expected to excrete yellowy stuff after having an enormous amount of 'besan kadhi'. Anita is appalled on hearing him say this.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: When Tika keeps teasing Manmohan regarding his constipation, he hits him on the head; later, a furious Tika files an FIR with inspector Happu, against Manmohan, after Vibhuti insists.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan blocks the pipeline that sends water to the town and refuses to let the water flow as a sign of punishment to those, who have been mocking his situation of constipation.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Angoori tells Anita that she is saddened by the fact that Manmohan is suffering from constipation. She tells Anita that Manmohan howls in pain due to it.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Manmohan, Vibhuti and Prem Chaudhary watch a movie, 'Chulbuli'. They praise its heroine in front of their wives. Anita and Angoori then decide to prank their husbands.

programme.title: Bheema - Andhkaar Se Adhikaar Tak
programme.desc: A brave young girl from the marginalised community, fights for equal rights, by using her voice against injustice and discrimination prevalent in the society.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Happu lives happily with his family and works day and night as a policeman. However, his life is filled with humorous events and misadventures at home and at work.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti Narayan Mishra and Manmohan Tiwari live in the same neighbourhood in Kanpur. They both try to impress each other's wives but end up landing in peculiar situations.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti speaks to Anita about earning enough money to afford a maid; Anita and Angoori begin their selection process for a new maid.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Angoori asks Tiwari to annoy Basanti, who is actually Vibhuti in disguise; while disguised as the maid, Vibhuti hears that Anita is getting bored with him.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti tries to intervene when Inspector Happu is arresting Angoori for murder. Happu shoots him and walks out with Angoori.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Seeing Angoori and Manmohan sharing a romantic moment, Vibhuti heads home and upsets Anita; Vibhuti meets Angoori's father and is delighted to learn that he hates Manmohan.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: When Angoori sees Manmohan leaving the colony with Angelina, she misunderstands the situation. An angry and hurt Angoori threatens to drink poison in front of the entire colony.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Vibhuti and Manmohan argue over bhindi and Vibhuti grabs the bag and runs; Vibhuti goes to Angoori's house to warn her of the kidnappers roaming around the area.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Bansidhar declines to perform at Happu's event, leading Happu to pretend to play the flute during the Janmashtami celebration. However, his fake playing is eventually uncovered.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Happu devises a scheme to retrieve his stolen coin and extorts money from Reshampal. Meanwhile, Rajesh cleverly manipulates Amma into handing over cash to him.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Reshampal pledges his support to Darling, who then returns the coin to Happu. Meanwhile, Malaika offers Masterji a solution to his predicament.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Rajesh is in a state of disarray, having misplaced Happu's important file and Malaika's belongings. Meanwhile, Doctor KB takes it upon himself to treat Reshampal's ailments at the station.

programme.title: Happu Ki Ultan Paltan
programme.desc: Rajesh uses the memory-enhancing powder provided by Happu and, after recalling a past event, demands that Happu make amends with Gabbar.

programme.title: Laal Ishq
programme.desc: After several people are mysteriously killed in a neighbourhood, two policemen arrive to investigate. They are terrified when a dead Kevin returns.

programme.title: Paramavatar Shri Krishna
programme.desc: Krishna goes to distract the elephant that is wreaking havoc in Gokul; the villagers dig a big hole to trap the elephant.

programme.title: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain!
programme.desc: Angoori is worried about Manmohan's chicken pox but Vibhuti decides to take her to a movie. But when Angoori's mother-in-law arrives, Vibhuti is forced to spend the day with her.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In 2154, where the rich reside in an advanced space station and the rest of the people thrive in poverty on Earth, a former criminal sets off on a mission to reinstate equality.

programme.desc: Robert McCall's close friend, Susan Plummer, is killed while investigating a murder-suicide. As a former marine and spy, he leverages his skills and resources to find the culprit and avenge her death.

programme.desc: After being bitten by a wolf, former senior editor Will Randall finds himself a changed man. Now full of vigour and youth, he fights to regain his job and also woos his former employer's daughter.

programme.desc: In this comedy-drama, a young troublemaker engages in a battle of wills with his heartless stepsister who is manipulative, cold-hearted.
